content: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) combines search-based document retrieval with generative models to improve factual accuracy and handle domain-specific queries.
Summarize the benefits of using FAISS for vector search.
FAISS is an efficient library for similarity search using dense vector embeddings. It supports fast indexing, scalable searches, and GPU acceleration for high-throughput environments.

How can I evaluate the performance of my GenAI chatbot?
You can use tools like Arize AI to track response relevance, semantic similarity, latency, and user satisfaction. Logging metrics over time helps identify drift and improve quality.
